title: Is Your Website Leaking? How Adding One Element to a Blog's Sidebar Achieved a 82.14% Lift in Conversions
excerpt: If you’re getting plenty of traffic but still not seeing sales, it usually means that your offer is not enticing enough to your visitors, or you’re getting the wrong type of traffic. But don’t be too quick to judge, because that’s not always the case. Sometimes, the issue is that people are having trouble finding your offer in the first place....
